settings.newsletter_richtext: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.text: We use cookies on our website to give you the best shopping experience. By using this site, you agree to its use of cookies.

settings.title: Are your products all natural?
settings.answer: Yes! We are always on the hunt for the freshest ingredients to create our products. The key to all natural products is to ensure the products are potent and as fresh as possible.

settings.title: What is the shelf life of your products?
settings.answer: Our products are all 100% natural and are made with fresh ingredients. This does mean that their shelf life may be somewhat lower than traditional beauty products but that's the trade off! The shelf life of our products do range from 1 month to 5 years.

settings.title: Do you test on animals?
settings.answer: Absolutely not. We take pride in ensuring that no products are ever tested on animals. We only select ingredients from companies who do not test on animals and when we are in the process of developing new products, we only test them out with human volunteers.

settings.title: Is your packaging recyclable?
settings.answer: You bet! While we aim to eliminate packaging from all of our products, there are still some products that require some help staying put. All packaging is 100% recyclable though, and can be brought back to our physical locations for a fun treat!

settings.title: When will my order ship?
settings.answer: Because our products are handmade, we need about 3-4 days to pack and ship your full order. Orders placed after our afternoon cutoff will ship the next business day.

settings.title: How is my shipping calculated?
settings.answer: Our shipping rates are determined by location and the total weight of your order. Shipping rates will be calculated and displayed at checkout!

settings.title: I have a question about my order, what should I do?
settings.answer: Reach out! Visit our contact page for any information regarding your order! We’re happy to answer questions about Orders, Order Modifications, Shipping, Returns, & Cancellations.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: If you’re not happy with a certain product, that’s okay! We just ask that returned items be 50% intact and returned with their original packaging. You can return items up to 30 days after the date it was shipped.

settings.title: Are you hiring?
settings.answer: You can check out the careers section of our website to see if we're currently hiring. If we're not, you’re always welcome to submit your resume and we’ll keep it on file.

settings.title: I'd like to become a stockist. Who can I talk to?
settings.answer: Exciting! We'd love the opportunity to become partners. Please reach out to us with your information so we can get chatting.

settings.title: A perfect combo of meat, cartilage and fat on a naturally dense bone.

settings.text:
Do you know where your pals treats are made?

Well, at Jack’s Premium you do. We produce and package our own goods - no middleman.

settings.title: We make ours right here in Dallas, Texas.

settings.subtitle: We love to hear from you!

settings.title: Need to get in touch?
settings.content_text: We're always happy to chat and help answer any questions you may have! Please note, we try our best to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours, Monday - Friday.

settings.callout_title: Are bully sticks good for my dog?
settings.callout_subtitle: Yes! Bully sticks are an all natural chew. High in protein, low in fat, and 100% digestible. There is no bone in bully sticks and they are not rawhide. It is a single ingredient treat free from preservatives, grains, and artificial flavors.

settings.callout_title: What should I feed my dog?
settings.callout_subtitle: We know dogs who have lived long happy healthy lives on all options. Not only are your dog’s needs different, but as a parent what works best for you had to be taken into consideration.

settings.callout_title: Are bully sticks good for my dog?
settings.callout_subtitle: Yes! Bully sticks are an all natural chew. High in protein, low in fat, and 100% digestible. There is no bone in bully sticks and they are not rawhide. It is a single ingredient treat free from preservatives, grains, and artificial flavors.

settings.callout_title: What should I feed my dog?
settings.callout_subtitle: If you are interested in raw or fresh meals, but do not want to incur the cost or mess, freeze dried is a terrific option. You can see the whole pieces of food too.

settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: Natural Ingredients Only
settings.text: We only add the good stuff. All of our products are safe for all skin types, with no added dyes or fillers. Paraben + sulfate free.

settings.title: Our shampoo bars are 100% pet-friendly, so you can make sure your best bud stays fresh + clean!
Soap Bars
settings.text: Our signature product now in over a dozen scents in both marble and original solid soap bars. Discover your signature scent with our favourite bath + body products.

settings.callout_title: Are grains good for my dog?
settings.callout_subtitle: We know dogs who have lived long happy healthy lives on all options. Not only are your dog’s needs different, but as a parent what works best for you had to be taken into consideration.

settings.callout_title: Which treat is right for my dog?
settings.callout_subtitle: We offer a variety of options so no matter what you can find something your dog will love. All our treat options will give you a peace of mind knowing that your dog is enjoying not a delicious treat, but something that is natural, limited ingredient, and supports your dog’s overall health and well-being.

settings.callout_title: What should I feed my cat?
settings.callout_subtitle: Cats are obligate carnivores, meaning they must eat mainly meat and animal organs to thrive.
